00022 /**
00023  * @file apt-copynumber-workflow.cpp
00024  *
00025  * @brief This file contains the housekeeping code for the apt-copynumber-workflow module.
00026  */
00027 
00028 #ifdef _DEBUG
00029 #ifndef _WIN64
00030 #ifdef _USE_VLD
00031 #include "../external/vld/vld.h"
00032 #endif
00033 #endif
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 //
00037 #include "copynumber/CNAnalysisMethodChipstream.h"
00038 #include "copynumber/CNAnalysisMethodFactory.h"
00039 #include "copynumber/CNWorkflowEngine.h"
00040 //
00041 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00042 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00043 #include "util/Fs.h"
00044 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00045 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00046 #include "util/Util.h"
00047 
00048 
00049 using namespace std;
00050 
00051 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) 
00052 {
00053   ofstream logOut;
00054   LogStream log;
00055   string logName;
00056     
00057   try {
00058     // make sure the file5 library has been started.
00059     affx::File5_open();
00060     
00061     CNWorkflowEngine engine;
00062     
00063     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00064     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00065     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00066     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00067     
00068     /* Parse options. */
00069     engine.setUsage(
00070         "apt-copynumber-workflow - A program to compute copy number \n"
00071     "results from DNA analysis arrays.\n\n"
00072         "usage:\n"
00073         "       ./apt-copynumber-workflow  \\\n"
00074     "       --adapter-type-normalization true \\\n"
00075     "       --text-output false \\\n"
00076     "       --reference-output CNReference.a5 \\\n"
00077     "       --set-analysis-name TestReference \\\n"
00078     "       --cdf-file GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf \\\n"
00079     "       --chrX-probes GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \\\n"
00080     "       --chrY-probes GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \\\n"
00081     "       --special-snps GenomeWideSNP_6.specialsnps \\\n"
00082     "       --netaffx-snp-annotation-file snp_annot_2.csv \\\n"
00083     "       --netaffx-cn-annotation-file cn_annot_2.csv \\\n"
00084     "       --o results --cel-files celfiles.txt");
00085 
00086 
00087     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00088     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00089     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00090     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00091     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00092     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00093     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00094     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00095     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00096     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00097     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00098     
00099     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00100     engine.checkOptions();
00101 
00102     engine.openStandardLog("apt-copynumber-workflow.log",logOut,log);
00103     
00104     engine.run();
00105   } 
00106   catch(...) {
00107       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00108       // Close log files
00109       logOut.close();
00110       return 1;
00111   }
00112   // Close log files
00113   logOut.close();
00114 
00115   return 0;
00116 }
